Buy plastic crates at plastic-crate.co.uk,we are a plastic products manufacturer and wholesale a range of Plastic Crates, including Euro Crates,Heavy Duty Euro Stacking Containers,plastic moving crates,plastic storage container,attached lid container,We aim to ensure you receive a higher level of customer service satisfaction along with the best quality products the Industry has to offer.
Stackable boxes are useful for many applications and commonly used in the catering industry (they are food grade), engineering trade (antistatic containers protect electrical components), bars and restaurants.
